sentences.en: Aiming at the weight computing problem in the group hierarchy process ( AHP ) , logarithmic regress is adopted.
sentences.cn: 针对群体层次 分析法 的权重计算问题, 采用对数回归法求解.

sentences.en: At the moment of victory, we regress.
sentences.cn: 在胜利的时刻, 我们后退了.

sentences.en: Benign cysts may be more prominent premenstrually and regress in size during the follicular phase.
sentences.cn: 良性囊肿在月经前更明显而在卵泡期大小恢复.

sentences.en: Do cancers always regress before killing us if they cannot maintain their telomeres?
sentences.cn: 如果癌症不能维持它们的端粒,那么在杀死我们之前它们总要退化 吗 ?

sentences.en: If your child regresses to babyish behaviour, all you know for certain is that the child is under stress.
sentences.cn: 如果你的孩子退步到幼稚的行为，你可以肯定的是孩子正处在压力之下。

sentences.en: It is a kind of relaxation, because thinking stops; you regress.
sentences.cn: 这是一种放松, 因为思想停止了, 你回归了.

sentences.en: Many prisoners, on being freed , regress to a life of crime.
sentences.cn: 许多囚犯, 一旦获释, 仍去犯罪.

sentences.en: Once we have reached the human level we do not regress back into animal forms.
sentences.cn: 一旦我们到达人类层次,我们就不再倒退到动物层次.

sentences.en: That could explain why some people never get cancer and why others'tumors spontaneously regress.
sentences.cn: 这说明了为什么有些人从不患癌症,而另外一些人的肿瘤为什么能够自行消退.

sentences.en: The freeze front will regress spontaneously.
sentences.cn: 冰冻前沿将会自动后退.

sentences.en: The thing is, rest, feel good and when you come back just regress.
sentences.cn: 关键是, 休息, 感觉很好,当你回来只是倒退.

sentences.en: This is because the rates of return on most systems tend to regress to the mean.
sentences.cn: 这是由于大多数系统的回报率会回归到这个水平.

sentences.en: Thispaperutilize diffeffdistant observation data of Suzhou huqiu tower distortion to found regress model and ARIMAmodel, theresultisrelativelysatisfaction.
sentences.cn: 本文对苏州虎丘塔变形的不等间隔观测数据, 建立了回归模型和ARIMA模型,结果比较满意.

sentences.en: To compute the risk ( Pr ) of fatality with the logistic regress equation.
sentences.cn: 应用Logistic回归方程计算新的预测病死几率 ( Pr ).

sentences.en: To stand still is to regress.

trans.tran_cn: 倒退， 复归， 逆行
trans.tran_en: When people or things regress, they return to an earlier and less advanced stage of development

trans.tran_cn: 逆行，倒退，退回，回归，退化
